data.actual_result: I can change the text by tapping on the comment form
data.expected_result: Won't be able to change the text
data.short_description: Can change the comment when sharing an image mid the sending process (loading animation)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your gallery - share an image with Discord - send it to someone/channel - try to tap on the comment and change it (while it's on the loading animation!)
